description: '''Nita Strauss''' (born December 7, 1986) is an American musician. She is currently a guitarist for [[Alice Cooper]], has also been a touring guitarist for [[Demi Lovato]] and has a successful career as a solo artist. Strauss is regularly featured on the covers of worldwide print magazines including ''[[Guitar World]]'' and ''[[Guitar Player]]'', was the first female signature artist with [[Ibanez]] guitars, and became the first female rock solo artist in 32 years to hit number one on Billboard's Mainstream Rock chart.
